short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful REST & HTTP API test client, provides an easy way to create/execute a batch of test cases, case dependency is supported

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Object Oriented REST & HTTP API test client. Super easy to make a batch of test cases by overwriting and inheriting a parent test case

Highlights:
    . child test case inherit or overwritten properties from its ancestors' 
    . support test case dependency
    . test case can use response value of the other test case as a parameter
    . execute multiple test cases at one time
    . supports HTTP response validation
    . backup/restore to/from Google drive's appfolder
